HotelManagementSystem

Class HotelManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • HotelManagementSystem.HotelManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HotelManagementSystem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Receptionist

    public abstract class HotelManagement
extends java.lang.Object
implements HotelManagementSystem
    Hotel management is an abstract class for HotelManagementSystem. Holds the helper method to make booking and cancelReservation etc.
